ai-patthana15.52:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.52:0.3_0: Talking on the inside, the Shady Orchid Tree have turnedside.
ai-patthana15.52:1.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on skillful things, not unskillful.
ai-patthana15.52:2.1_0: Gladness doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or skillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana15.52:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.52:3.1_0: A mendicant doesn’t give rise to skillful qualities, doesn’t give rise to the defilements. ...
ai-patthana15.52:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.52:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
